Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.livingRoom

Class LivingRoomBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.livingRoom.LivingRoomBoard
public class LivingRoomBoard extends Object
LivingRoomBoard represent the living room board and implements all the methods necessary

  • Constructor Details

    • LivingRoomBoard

      public LivingRoomBoard(int numPlayers) throws PlayersNumberOutOfRange
      Constructor for the LivingRoomBoard class. It creates the layout of the board depending on how many players will play the game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - Number of players that play the game
      Throws:
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - if the given number of players is out of range

  • Method Details

    • subscribeToListener

      public void subscribeToListener(BoardSubscriber subscriber)
      This method subscribe a subscriber to the listener of the LivingRoomBoard
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the subscriber that needs to be subscribed to the listener

    • checkRefill

      public boolean checkRefill()
      Refill the living room board with new tiles
      Returns:
      true if the board has to be refilled, false otherwise

    • emptyBoard

      public ArrayList<ItemTile> emptyBoard()
      This method removes all the tiles from the Board
      Returns:
      a list of all the tiles removed

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard(ArrayList<ItemTile> tiles) throws NotEnoughTilesException
      Refill the living room board
      Parameters:
      tiles - contains the tiles that are going to be inserted in the board
      Throws:
      NotEnoughTilesException - is thrown if the given tiles are not enough

    • getTile

      public Optional<ItemTile> getTile(Coordinates coo) throws InvalidCoordinatesException
      Return the content of a slot from the living room board
      Parameters:
      coo - is the coordinates object for the tile to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Optional with the content of the slot requested
      Throws:
      InvalidCoordinatesException - is thrown if the coordinates are out of range

    • removeTile

      public void removeTile(Coordinates coo)
      Used to remove a single tile from the board
      Parameters:
      coo - coordinates of the requested slot

    • getNumCells

      public int getNumCells()
      Get the number of valid cells in this instance of the board
      Returns:
      number of valid/usable cells in the board (numCells changes depending on the number of players)

    • unsubscribeFromListener

      public void unsubscribeFromListener(String username)
      Unsubscribes a player from the boardListener
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be removed

    • checkValidRetrieve

      public boolean checkValidRetrieve(ArrayList<Coordinates> coords) throws EmptySlotException
      Check if the given retrieve from the board is valid
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates of the tiles that the caller wants to retrieve from the board
      Returns:
      true if the requested move is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EmptySlotException - is thrown if a coordinates results to an empty slot

    • triggerListener

      public void triggerListener(String userToBeUpdated)
      Trigger the subscriber related the boardListener of a specified player
      Parameters:
      userToBeUpdated - username of the player to be updated
